Package com.pizzeria.training.controllers

Class PizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.pizzeria.training.controllers.PizzaController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/pizzas")
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
public class PizzaController
extends java.lang.Object
REST controller class for Pizza object to interact with mongoDB database

    • updatePizza

      @PutMapping public com.pizzeria.training.models.Pizza updatePizza​(@RequestParam org.bson.types.ObjectId _id, @RequestBody com.pizzeria.training.models.Pizza updatePizza)
      Put method for updating pizza information
      Parameters:
      _id - MongoDB document Id to identify pizza to edit
      updatePizza - New Pizza object to replace the one currently under the Id
      Returns:
      Saves updated pizza in the database
